div.p: All CPSB schools will remain closed through the remainder of the school year. All CPSB teachers now have Blackboard Websites. Blackboard is an online means for teachers to post resources for their students. To reach your child’s teacher’s Blackboard Website, go to www.cpsb.org then click on “Our Schools” to select the school then click on the “Faculty” tab.
